hero.title: 2026, Let’s Pray Together
hero.subtitle: A year of prayer, discipleship, and compassionate care.

welcome.title: Welcome / Who We Are
welcome.body: We are a Christ-centered church in the neighborhood, gathering weekly to worship, grow in the Word, and serve with compassion.

vision.title: Vision
vision.body: One family in Christ, praying faithfully and serving our city with hope.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: We are a Christ-centered church committed to prayer, discipleship, and serving our neighbors with compassion.

cards.heart_body: We want every person to feel known, loved, and equipped to follow Jesus.
cards.community_body: We partner with local ministries to support vulnerable children and families.
cards.rhythm_body: Worship, prayer, and shared meals shape the way we grow together.

staffs.title: Staffs
staffs.subtitle: Meet the team serving our church community.

pastor.title: Greetings from Your Pastor
pastor.subtitle: A word of welcome from our shepherd.
pastor.body_1: Welcome to Good Together Church. It is a joy to serve alongside you as we seek Jesus, love our neighbors, and grow as a family of faith.
pastor.body_2: Our church is committed to prayer, Scripture, and compassionate action. We believe God is at work in every season, and we want to walk with you through worship, discipleship, and community care.
pastor.body_3: Whether you are new to faith or have followed Christ for years, you belong here. I look forward to meeting you and praying with you.

vision.title: Vision
vision.subtitle: We envision a church that collaborates with local partners to uplift vulnerable children and families.

mission.title: Mission
mission.subtitle: We make disciples who love God and neighbor with a special focus on vulnerable children and families.
mission.body: We commit to a culture of humility, kindness, and faithful presence.

history.title: History
history.subtitle: A brief timeline of God’s faithfulness in our church family.
history.event_1: 2015: Good Together Church launched with a small prayer group.
history.event_2: 2018: Expanded to two Sunday services and neighborhood outreach.
history.event_3: 2023: Opened community care partnerships for families in need.
history.event_4: 2026: Entered a year-long focus on prayer and discipleship.

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: Join us for worship and prayer gatherings throughout the week.

service_details.w1_body: Sunday at 9:00 AM. A welcoming service for the whole family.
service_details.w1_note: Expect worship, prayer, and a teaching message. Children’s ministry is available.
service_details.w2_body: Sunday at 11:00 AM. A mid-morning gathering with extended worship.
service_details.w2_note: Join us for worship, Scripture, and community prayer.
service_details.wed_body: Wednesday at 7:30 PM. Weekly prayer and encouragement.
service_details.wed_note: We gather to pray for our church, city, and one another.
service_details.sat_body: Saturday at 6:30 AM. Start the weekend in prayer.
service_details.sat_note: Join us for early morning prayer and a short devotional.
